contactVA.tty.body: If you have hearing loss, call TTY:
contactVA.va311.body: VA311 is a national toll-free number through which Veterans can access all VA has to offer.
contactVA.va311.body.a11yLabel: V-A 3 1 1 is a national toll-free number through which Veterans can access all V-A has to offer.

covid19Vaccinations.heading: Fill out the form below to sign up
covid19Vaccinations.instructions: We’ll send you regular updates on how we’re providing COVID-19 vaccines across the country—and when you can get your vaccine if you want one. You don't need to sign up to get a vaccine.
covid19Vaccinations.interestedInVaccine: Are you interested in getting a COVID-19 vaccine at VA?

covid19Vaccinations.sameZipcode: Will you be in this zip code for the next 6 to 12 months?

veteransCrisisLine.callA11yHint: Dials this number via your device’s call function
veteransCrisisLine.callTTY: Call TTY if you have hearing loss:
veteransCrisisLine.connectWithResponders: If you are a Veteran in crisis or concerned about one, connect with our caring, qualified responders for confidential help. Many of them are Veterans themselves.
veteransCrisisLine.crisisUrlA11yHint: Takes you to a crisis chat web page
veteransCrisisLine.textA11yHint: Opens a new text message with this number via your device’s text messaging function
veteransCrisisLine.title: Veterans Crisis Line
veteransCrisisLine.urlA11yHint: Takes you to a resource page
veteransCrisisLine.weAreHereForYou: We’re here anytime, day or night – 24/7
